data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dabert, Jacek, Ehrnsberger, Rainer, Dabert, Miroslawa (2008): Glaucalges tytonis sp. n. (Analgoidea, Xolalgidae) from the barn owl Tyto alba (Strigiformes, Tytonidae): compiling morphology with DNA barcode data for taxon descriptions in mites (Acari). Zootaxa 1719: 41-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181058
